sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import './VotingDetails.css'; import moment from 'moment'; const VotingDetails = (props) => { let vote = props.votingDtlsData, status = vote.outcome console.log("vote!!!!!!!!!!",vote) console.log("VotingDetails:::::", moment(moment.utc(vote.expires)).format("DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm"), (moment.utc()).format("DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm")) console.log("VotingDetails:::::", moment(moment.utc(vote.expires).format("DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm")), (moment.utc().format("DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm"))) console.log("VotingDetails:::::", moment(moment.utc(vote.expires).format()), (moment.utc().format())) console.log("VotingDetails:::::", moment(moment.utc(vote.expires).format()).isAfter(moment.utc().format())) console.log("props.show",props.show) return ( <>
{vote.type}
#{vote.contentId} {vote.type}
{status} ({moment(vote.expires).format("DD-MM-YYYY HH:mm")})
Proposed By: {vote.creator}
{vote.question && {vote.question}}
Yes {vote.yesPerc}%
No {vote.noPerc}%
{vote.canIVote &&
{moment(moment.utc(vote.expires).format()).isAfter(moment.utc().format()) ? vote.voted.includes(localStorage.getItem('activeEosAccount')) ?
// vote.yes > 0 // ?
You Accepted Proposal
// :
You Rejected Proposal
:
props.votedQuestion(vote, true)}>Yes
props.votedQuestion(vote, false)}>No
:
} {/*
You Accepted Proposal
You Rejected Proposal
*/}
} ); } export default withRouter(VotingDetails);
